attributes.action: Require education about origins of drugs  and publicity programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Education about the effects of illegal drug production on the population of those countries of origin eg S. America, Afghanistan and  Mexico, would make users in UK think more about using these drugs, which are financing crime and the terrorism.
All schools should be required to make such information part of their programme, if they do not do so already.
Also a publicity campaign should be set up to promote this knowledge among the public. This problem does not get enough attention in the media.
